pageContext.claim: “We've expanded funding for the Everglades restoration by over 55 percent compared to four years ago.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump’s math misses the mark here. The Trump administration signed off on roughly $200 million in funding for the Everglades in 2020 — $40 million less than Obama requested in 2016. Ultimately, though, Obama did more, authorizing $2 billion in spending to support restoration efforts in the Everglades just before leaving office.
